ComicInfo.Title: Fear On Four Worlds Part IV
ComicInfo.Summary:
Regular SolicitThe dimension-spanning, four-part "Fear on Four Worlds" storyline comes to a thunderous conclusion in the prehistoric world where it all began- The Land That Time Forgot! Edgar Rice Burroughs' greatest sci-fi worlds of adventure are all joined into one universe as Abby Tyler and Ethan Bradley battle their way back to their adopted home, the lost island of Caspak! But hot on their heels and out for blood are the voracious, flesh-eating, dinosaur-riding Horibs, the hideous lizard-men from Pellucidar, at the Earth's core! This issue comes with three covers - Main Cover by Mike Wolfer, Timeless & B&W Limited Edition Covers by Cyrus Mesarcia, and a Blank Sketch Edition.
Limited Edition SolicitThis special edition of The Land That Time Forgot Fear on Four Worlds #1 is a hidden treasure! Take home a piece of Edgar Rice Burroughs classic science fiction fantasy with this special edition B&W Cover limited to only 400 copies!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Reg | Regular Cover | Mike Wolfer | 1 | Var | Visions Variant Cover | Cyrus Mesarcia & Enrica Eren Angiolini | 2 | LE | Limited Edition Black & White Variant Cover, Limited to 400 | Cyrus Mesarcia | 3 | Var | Blank Variant Sketch Cover | None | 4 |
